short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab-In is a great tool used for people like me that have a lot of tabs open, it allows you to easily search for any tab you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab-In is a tool allowing users to search through their tabs with ease. You can use the shortcut "Ctrl+Shift+V" to open the extension in another tab and begin typing the tab you desire. In order to go to the desired tab you can either keep typing until its at the top of the search and then hit enter or you can manually click it using your cursor. After you navigate to your desired tab it will automatically remove the tab used for searching clearing up space for you.
